com.adobe.cq.social.badging.api

Interface UserBadge


  • public interface UserBadge
    A user's earned/assigned badge info containing the path to the badge content (resource for the image, title, etc.) and whether it's an assigned badge.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getBadgePath() 
      java.lang.String getImagePath()
      Deprecated. 
      Resource getResource()
      The earned or assigned badge user generated content resource.
      boolean isAssigned() 

    • Method Detail

      • getImagePath

        @Deprecated
 @Nonnull
java.lang.String getImagePath()
        Deprecated. 
        Returns the absolute path to the badge image, e.g. the path to the png image. Can return an empty string if image can't be found or it no longer exist (e.g. resource removed from /libs/community/badging/images).
        Returns:
        absolute path to the badge image resource.

      • getBadgePath

        @Nonnull
java.lang.String getBadgePath()
        Returns:
        the BadgingService.BADGE_PATH_PROP property or empty string if it doesn't exist.

      • isAssigned

        boolean isAssigned()
        Returns:
        true if badge is an assigned badge.

      • getResource

        @Nonnull
Resource getResource()
        The earned or assigned badge user generated content resource. For example, resources in /content/usergenerated/asi/srp/{user's profile path}/badges. Not to be confused with a badge content resource, such as the resources in /libs/community/badging/images.
        Returns:
        the resource of the badge.
